# Draaki Equipment
## Overview
***[[Draaki]] have access to the following equipment.***

The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Draaki|draaki]] equipment introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

---
## Governed Content
- [[Draaki Fangs]]
- [[Draaki Sinew Bowstring]]
- [[Draaki Tail Spurs]]
- [[Dragonbone]]
